data.persona: I work directly for the king and queen. I do as they say or I become punished. In exchange I am fed and given housing.
data.description:
You are in the captain's cabin.
The captain's cabin is a complete mess. There are multiple maps on the wall, pinned over one another, each with messy writing scrawled over it and multiple X marks in random places. Papers overflow off the desk and across the floor in waves, impeding the captain as he paces, muttering angrily. The bed is messy and unmade, giving the impression that the captain has spent the night tossing and turning. Random objects have been thrown about the room.
The guard and the mariner are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoe.

            "desc": "The captain's cabin is a complete mess. There are multiple maps on the wall, pinned over one another, each with messy writing scrawled over it and multiple X marks in random places. Papers overflow off the desk and across the floor in waves, impeding the captain as he paces, muttering angrily. The bed is messy and unmade, giving the impression that the captain has spent the night tossing and turning. Random objects have been thrown about the room.",
            "extra_desc": "This room is where the captain lets his guard down. He must appear strong and confident for his men, to keep up his reputation and prevent capture, but he is beginning to feel the pressure. Every year there are more and more authorities looking for them, and it is becoming harder and harder to evade them. With the mariners avoiding them it is getting harder  to steal from other ships, and they haven't had any luck finding any treasure for the last two years. Now the captain is exhausted and furious, leading to the disarray of the room.",

data.short_motivation: The Captain has asked me to give the map to the guard so he can take it away with him
data.mid_motivation: The Captain has requested that the map be sent to the Head of the Infantry for inspection to draw up battle plans so I have informed the guard to take it straight to him.
data.long_motivation: The head of the Infantry is a ferocious battle planner . When he gets the map he will know exactly what to do , so I will be safe and I can rest easy knowing he will protect the Kingdom

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink some water from the servants quarters

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the Captain into his cabin

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the Captain out the room into the hallway

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the Kings quarters as he has summoned me

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat some dinner from the staff room which as been cooked by the chef
